§ 30530. Liability as master, officer, or seaman not affected This chapter does not affect the liability of an individual as a master, officer, or seaman, even though the individual is also an owner of the vessel. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 6(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1516, § 30512; renumbered § 30530, Pub. L. 117–263, div. K, title CXV, § 11503(a)(3), Dec. 23, 2022, 136 Stat. 4130.)
